mapper.select: select * from kor_dict where word like '마이크로%'

select kor.* from (select * from kor_dict) kor where match (word) AGAINST (#{keyword} in natural language mode) order by word=#{keyword} desc , pronunciation=CONCAT('[',#{keyword},']') desc, id desc limit 0,15

SELECT kor.id, kor.word, kor.is_unique, kor.pronunciation, kor.part, kor.meaning, kor.example, kor.field, kor.proverb, kor.idiom, kor.classification from (select * from kor_dict) kor WHERE
id < #{korDictId} and
MATCH (word) AGAINST (#{keyword} in natural language mode) order by word=#{keyword} desc , pronunciation=CONCAT('[',#{keyword},']') desc, id desc limit 10
